songs.title: Past Lives
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
We were lovers in a past life
I can see it your green eyes
Maybe you were one of my wives
In a long lost tribe
There's just something bout' you I know
It started centuries ago, though
To see your kiss is like a lost ghost
Only I would know

[Pre-Chorus]
But I, I keep on falling
For you

[Chorus]
Time after time
Time after time
I'll make you mine
Time after
Time after time

[Verse 2]
See, millenniums ago, love
We were nothing but stardust
Just the galaxy beneath us
We found weight
Then we made it through the Ice Age
But I lost you in the crusades
I built the pyramids for you, babe
Just to see your face

[Pre-Chorus]
But I, I keep on falling
For you

[Chorus]
Time after time
Time after time
I'll make you mine
Time after...
Time after time
Yeah...

[Outro]
Time after...
Time after...
Time after...
Time after...
Time after...
Time after...
